scenario.title: As a user, I want to the total Like-to-time coefficient to be maximum for the dishes.
scenario.step: Given I have an array 1,2,3 of dishes
And I want to be able to remove 1 in the 1,2,3 array
Then a new coefficient is calculated usign the left dishes

scenario.title: As a user, I want to be calculate the maximum sum of all possible coefficients.
scenario.step: Given I have an array 1,2,3 of dishes
And I want to be calculate the maximum sum of all possible coefficients
Then a maximum sum is calculated
